meanings.sent1: The farmer raised gallinaceous birds for their eggs.
meanings.sent2: The gallinaceous creatures clucked happily in the coop.
meanings.sent3: The gallinaceous hen tried to teach the duck to cluck like her.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as gallinaceous as the sound of a rooster crowing at dawn.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the gallinaceous feathers filled the barnyard with a familiar scent.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a chicken or other domestic fowl
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a gallinaceous dish using chicken and herbs.
meanings.sent2: The gallinaceous feathers of the costume made the actor look like a chicken.
meanings.sent3: The gallinaceous hat made him look like a walking chicken coop.
meanings.sent4: Her gallinaceous walk reminded him of a proud rooster strutting around.
meanings.sent5: The gallinaceous sound of the alarm clock made her dream of a farmyard awakening.
